topics.body:
Stand name: Ghost.
Strength: C
Speed: A
Range: B
Endurance: D
Potential: B
Ability: Forced Astral Projection. Any person punched four times by Ghost will have his or her spirit removed from their body. While the victim's spirit is out of their body they can't interact with anyone or anything. They can however access their Stand ability. Unfortunately Ghost and it's user are still vulnerable to the disembodied spirits.
